Shah Rukh Khan Wants To Play Virat Kohli On Screen & Here’s What Anushka Sharma Has To Say On It
Shah Rukh Khan Wants To Play Virat Kohli On Screen & Here’s What Anushka Sharma Has To Say On It
Chak De India is perhaps one of the most special movies of Shah Rukh Khan. His sattar minute dialogues still gives goosebumps to many. When he recently narrated the dialogue at the Hockey World Cup Opening Ceremony, it had sent chills down the spines of every viewer.
Sattar Minute, Sattar Minute hai tumhare paas 🔥 Aag hi laga diya Jaan ne toh aaj, Hath mein Hockey Stick lekar uss mahol mein yeh Iconic lines bole, dialogue ke jaise nahi waise jaise apne Bacchon ko advice karte huye kehte, Dil se unhe motivate kiye💘😍
pic.twitter.com/xc33Op1g2H — ✿ Sнαн Kι Bιωι ✿ ᶻᵉʳᵒ (@JacyKhan) November 27, 2018
We have seen the heartthrob of Bollywood play the role of a hockey player on screen. But would you want to see him to play a cricketer in one of his future films?
When Shah Rukh Khan was asked which cricketer he wants to play on-screen, he told Times Now, “Viral Kohli”.
When he took Virat’s name, all Anushka Sharma did was smile and say, “But you will have to grow a beard.”
PTI
“But I had grown a beard. In Harry Met Sejal, I looked just like Virat Kohli. Exactly like him,” he replied to her.
AFP
Don't Miss 3.4 K SHARES 343 SHARES 555 SHARES
Do you also feel SRK looks like Virat Kohli with a beard?
Meanwhile, Virat Kohli watched Shah Rukh Khan, Anushka Sharma and Katrina Kaif starrer Zero, and he simply loved the movie. When he announced the same on Twitter, he got severely trolled.
Read More: Virat Kohli Calls Anushka Sharma’s Performance In Zero ‘Outstanding’ & Trolls Can’t Keep Calm
Virat Kohli’s name was recently embroiled in a controversy after Naseeruddin Shah said that he was the “worst behaved player.”
Also Read: Naseeruddin Shah Calls Virat Kohli 'Worst Behaved Player’, Stirs Up A Storm On The Internet
Who do you think should essay Virat Kohli’s role, if a film on him is ever made – tell us in the comments section below.
